hypothesis_content.title: Post-Stress Altcoin Correlation Reversion
hypothesis_content.statement: Following STRESS regime exits, altcoins that experienced > 0.9 5-day correlation to BTC during stress will mean-revert to their 90-day average correlation faster than BTC price recovers, creating pairs trading opportunities.
hypothesis_content.rationale: During stress, all crypto assets correlate near 1.0. As markets normalize, idiosyncratic factors re-emerge, causing correlations to diverge. This reversion occurs faster than price recovery.
entry_conditions: Regime transitions from STRESS to NEUTRAL/BULL
Altcoin's 5-day correlation to BTC > 0.9 during stress period
Altcoin/BTC pair 5-day RSI > 70 (overbought relative to BTC)

exit_conditions.take_profit: Correlation reverts to within 0.1 of 90-day average
exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC drops > 8% from entry, indicating stress resumption

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: High correlations persist for >10 days after stress regime ends, indicating structural change in market dynamics.
